id:
Crunchyroll




Miss Kobayashi Gets Her Own Swimsuit Figure
Related Article
paragraph:
Miss Kobayashi is joining her dragon friends as part of the show's swimsuit figure line! The new figure features the show's maid-obsessed protagonist decked out in a school-style swimsuit, complete with her name written across the front. She stands 250mm tall (about 1/6 scale), and comes with a clear display base.  The figure sells for 12,000 yen, and is available for preorder until November 27. Orders are expected to ship out at the end of January. >> Miss Kobayashi Figure on AmiAmi>> Watch Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid on CrunchyrollSource: Anime! Anime! ----- Kara Dennison is responsible for multiple webcomics, and is half the creative team behind the OEL light novel series Owl's Flower. She blogs at karadennison.com and tweets @RubyCosmos. Her latest work can be seen in the anthology Relics, currently available from Red Ted Books.
